title: Malaysia's flight 370, the smuggled photo Onto Internet?
subtitle: One of the passengers on Malaysian Airlines ' flight hid 370 of his cell phone in an ashtray and used it to post a photo on the Internet following the hijacking of the plane and the imprisonment of its passengers.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: One of the passengers on Malaysian Airlines ' flight hid 370 of his cell phone in an ashtray and used it to post a photo on the Internet following the hijacking of the plane and the imprisonment of its passengers.
